alert.note: Alert for Henry; Newton; Rockdale (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 2:49PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Rockdale, central Henry and west central Newton Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 248 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over McDonough. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... McDonough, Stockbridge, Blacksville, Ola, Magnet, Flippen, Kelleytown and Oak Hill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
